alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 20 at 8:54AM AKST until February 22 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Yukon Delta, mainly south of the Yukon River. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
